Jason Richardson

Jason Anthony Richardson

(J-Rich)

Position: Shooting Guard and Small Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-6, 220lb (198cm, 99kg)

Born: January 20, 1981 in Saginaw, Michigan us

Relatives: Son Jase Richardson

College: Michigan State

High School: Arthur Hill in Saginaw, Michigan

Recruiting Rank: 1999 (14)

Draft: Golden State Warriors, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 2001 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 31, 2001

Career Length: 13 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Jason Richardson?

Jason Richardson is 44 years old.

Where was Jason Richardson born?

Jason Richardson was born in Saginaw, Michigan.

When was Jason Richardson born?

Jason Richardson was born on January 20, 1981.

How tall is Jason Richardson?

Jason Richardson is 6-6 (198 cm) tall.

How much did Jason Richardson weigh when playing?

Jason Richardson weighed 220 lbs (99 kg) when playing.

Is Jason Richardson in the Hall of Fame?

Jason Richardson is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Jason Richardson drafted?

Jason Richardson was drafted by Golden State Warriors, 1st round (5th pick, 5th overall), 2001 NBA Draft.

What position did Jason Richardson play?

Shooting Guard and Small Forward.

When did Jason Richardson retire?

Jason Richardson last played in 2015.

What is Jason Richardson's net worth?

Jason Richardson made at least $105,356,093 playing professional basketball.

How much did Jason Richardson make?

Jason Richardson made $14,444,444 in 2011.

What did Jason Richardson average?

Jason Richardson averaged 17.1 points, 5.0 rebounds, and 2.7 assists per game.

How many rings does Jason Richardson have?

Jason Richardson won 0 championships.

What schools did Jason Richardson attend?

Jason Richardson attended Arthur Hill in Saginaw, Michigan and Michigan State.

What are Jason Richardson's nicknames?

J-Rich is a nickname for Jason Richardson.
